insert (  )

insert Inserts the record into permanent storage. If the record already existed, does nothing.

Returns:
void
Author:
Matt Brewer
reset (  )

reset Reads the record from the database. This will "reset" any modifications in memory to those in storage.

Exceptions:
PharosModelInvalidLoadException
Returns:
bool $success
Author:
Matt Brewer
save (  )

save Saves the record to database if there are changes to be recorded. If the record has never been saved, performs an insert

Returns:
void
Author:
Matt Brewer
